title: Announcement: CitR x disco naïveté present DARK PARADISE @ SXSW
body:
We’re beyond proud to announce the most exciting moment in CitR’s existence to date.

Teaming up with blog-brother [disco naïveté](disconaivete.com), we’re delighted to present DARK PARADISE, an unofficial day party at SXSW in Austin, Texas, featuring a host of our favourite new artists. Having provided a digital platform for many of them, it’s fantastic to be able to offer them a stage upon which to impress at the finest new music festival in the world. Taking place at BD Riley’s, 204 East 6th Street on Wednesday 13th March, from 12pm-6pm, we also have to thank [MailChimp](mailchimp.com) for their generous involvement.

So without further ado, CitR x disco naïveté are delighted to present: DARK PARADISE

STARRING:

S O H N

Eddi Front

Pacific Air

Young Dreams

Mozart’s Sister

NO

GEMS

DENA (dj)

Entry is free, and a SXSW badge/wristband is not required, however the venue may reach capacity, in which case it will be one in, one out.

Attending SXSW has always been a dream of mine (and Ben’s) and to not only be able to go but to host such a brilliant roster of acts, is quite simply unbelievable. To confirm your attendance, simply RSVP below, or head over to the [Facebook event page](http://www.facebook.com/events/538519732837790/538521449504285/?notif_t=plan_mall_activity). See you in Austin!

[![Eventbrite - CitR x disco naïveté present Dark Paradise @ SXSW](http://www.eventbrite.com/custombutton?eid=5703238540)](http://www.eventbrite.com/event/5703238540?ref=ebtn)
